title: To Kill a Mockingbird
description: A gripping, heart-wrenching, and wholly remarkable tale of coming-of-age in a South poisoned by virulent prejudice.
A dystopian novel set in a totalitarian society ruled by Big Brother.

title: The Great Gatsby
description: A novel about the American dream and the roaring twenties.

title: Pride and Prejudice
description: A classic novel of manners that explores the romantic entanglements of the Bennett family.

title: The Catcher in the Rye
description: The story of Holden Caulfield, a teenager navigating life in 1950s New York.

title: Moby Dick
description: An epic tale of obsession and revenge as Captain Ahab hunts the great white whale.

title: The Lord of the Rings
description: A fantasy epic that follows the journey of Frodo Baggins to destroy the One Ring.

title: The Hobbit
description: A prelude to The Lord of the Rings, this novel follows Bilbo Baggins on an unexpected adventure.

title: War and Peace
description: A historical novel that chronicles the French invasion of Russia and its impact on Tsarist society.

title: Anna Karenina
description: A tragic love story set against the backdrop of Russian aristocracy.

title: Jane Eyre
description: A gothic romance that follows the experiences of Jane Eyre as she grows into adulthood.

title: Brave New World
description: A dystopian novel set in a future where society is conditioned to conform to a world of pleasure and control.

title: The Alchemist
description: A philosophical novel that follows a shepherd's journey to fulfill his personal legend.

title: Wuthering Heights
description: A dark romance set on the Yorkshire moors that explores themes of love, revenge, and the supernatural.

title: The Odyssey
description: An ancient Greek epic that follows the hero Odysseus' journey home from the Trojan War.

title: The Iliad
description: A classic epic about the Trojan War, focusing on the hero Achilles.

title: Crime and Punishment
description: A psychological novel that explores the mental anguish of a young man who commits a murder.

title: Frankenstein
description: A gothic novel about a scientist who creates life and the consequences of his actions.

title: Dracula
description: A horror novel about the vampire Count Dracula and his attempts to move from Transylvania to England.
